input.sentences: we boarded the boat preparing to go fishing .
we saw lots of other boats on our way out to fish .
you could see the houses along the dock on our way out to fish .
we passed a big boat on the way out .
once we were out at sea we could see all the buildings along the shore .
output.sentences: Manuel is preparing his fishing boat for the day.
He waves hello to the other fisherman as he boats on his way.
The houses and docks all smell of fish.
To not get hit by that big boat is his wish.
The shore is too busy so Manuel likes to fish.
